title: Value of National Basketball Association franchises 2020
yAxis: Franchise value in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Nba Team in the x axis and Franchise value in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Nba Team New York Knicks has the highest Franchise value in million U.S. dollars and Memphis Grizzlies has the lowest Franchise value in million U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 3300.0 between the maximum Nba Team New York Knicks and minimum Nba Team Memphis Grizzlies.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Franchise value in million U.S. dollars for 30 number of Nba Teams.
The Franchise value in million U.S. dollars is highest at Nba Team New York Knicks and lowest at Nba Team Memphis Grizzlies.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Nba Team in the x axis and Franchise value in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Nba Team New York Knicks has the highest Franchise value in million U.S. dollars and Memphis Grizzlies has the lowest Franchise value in million U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 3300.0 between the maximum Nba Team New York Knicks and minimum Nba Team Memphis Grizzlies.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Franchise value in million U.S. dollars for 30 number of Nba Teams.
The Franchise value in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Nba Team New York Knicks and lowest at Nba Team Memphis Grizzlies.
The minimum Nba Team Memphis Grizzlies has got 3.54 times less Franchise value in million U.S. dollars than the maximum Nba Team New York Knicks.
Franchise value in million U.S. dollars at Nba Team New York Knicks is 4600.0 , second place is Los Angeles Lakers at 4400.0, and thirdly is Golden State Warriors at 4300.0.
The lowest value 1300.0 at Memphis Grizzlies is almost 2.17 times smaller than the average value 2123.0.
